name: Makes contact
description: User touches the target.  This triggers some abilities (e.g., :ability:`Static`) and items (e.g., :item:`Sticky Barb`).

name: Blocked by Detect and Protect
description: This move will not work if the target has used :move:`Detect` or :move:`Protect` this turn.

name: Reflectable with Magic Coat
description: This move will be reflected back at the user if the target has used :move:`Magic Coat` this turn.

name: Snatchable
description: This move will be stolen if another Pok√©mon has used :move:`Snatch` this turn.

name: Rolls accuracy
description: This move is affected by :mechanic:`accuracy` and :mechanic:`evasion` modifiers.

name: Flinches with King's Rock
description: A held :item:`King's Rock` gives this move an 11.7% chance to make the target :mechanic:`flinch`.
